document.full_text: opening statements in the murder trial of casey anthony, charged with the 2008 killing of her two-year-old daughter caylee, were set to begin on tuesday after 12 jurors and five alternates were sworn in on friday.
document.title: murder trial of casey anthony set to begin tuesday
lines_and_colors: opening statements in the murder trial of casey anthony, charged with the 2008 killing of her two-year-old daughter caylee, were set to begin on tuesday after 12 jurors and five alternates were sworn in on friday.
